adventures.title: Snuggle Up
adventures.desc: Build an elaborate blanket fort and spend a night in it

adventures.title: Movie Roulette
adventures.desc: Go to the cinema at a random time and see the first film showing

adventures.title: 99 Problems
adventures.desc: Go and hunt down an ice-cream van to buy an ice-cream from

adventures.title: The Hills are Alive!
adventures.desc: Climb a hill or mountain or go up tall building and perform a song at the top of your voice

adventures.title: Treat yo self
adventures.desc: Pick a treat (hot chocolate, ice-cream, dessert, ...), and find three new places to try it from

adventures.title: The Bathshower
adventures.desc: Design and enjoy a really decadent bathing experience

adventures.title: Dress to Impress
adventures.desc: Get super dressed-up (either fancy clothes or a costume) and go to work or grocery shopping or take the bins out

adventures.title: I made u dis
adventures.desc: Make a really special care package and send it to someone

adventures.title: Three Simple Words
adventures.desc: Pick 1 to 3 random words and make a piece of art/performance/song/poem/story/anything else inspired by them

adventures.title: Soulful Brooding Midnight Walk
adventures.desc: Go for a walk at night and explore somewhere new (be safe!)

adventures.title: Culinary Tourism
adventures.desc: Put a pin in a map of the world blindfolded and then try to cook a meal from that country

adventures.title: The Edge of Glory
adventures.desc: Dance like nature intended, i.e. naked (bonus points if it is outside)

adventures.title: Beach Trip!
adventures.desc: Go to the beach in whatever way is possible (real beach, imaginary beach, watching a beach film while lying on a towel in swimwear, etc...)

adventures.title: Random Gourmet.
adventures.desc: Randomly pick six ingredients at the grocery store (Don't think. Just grab) Now, make a meal out of them

adventures.title: Recycle!
adventures.desc: Remake something you do not want any longer into something good or useful

adventures.title: Heads or Tails
adventures.desc: Use a coin toss to make all your non-vital decisions for a morning, afternoon or evening

adventures.title: Wet and Wild
adventures.desc: Go wild swimming (and if this is something you do already, pick somewhere new)

adventures.title: The International Day of Adventures
adventures.desc: Pick a day and look up on wikipedia what things are celebrated that day (festivals across the world, days of remembrance, famous people's birthdays), and celebrate one of them

adventures.title: Rip It Up!
adventures.desc: Alter a t-shirt into something cool and new, and wear it

adventures.title: Special Showing
adventures.desc: Pick a film and arrange a special showing (e.g. sing-along, wear costume, themed snacks, or make a live-action version)

adventures.title: Transform and Roll Out
adventures.desc: Make a transformation video (or yourself, a friend, an object, etc)

adventures.title: BUBBLES!!!
adventures.desc: Make bubbles (as big or as many as possible)

adventures.title: The Manic Pixie Dream Girl
adventures.desc: Find a willing friend and inject their life with a tiny adventure.

adventures.title: Dominoes and Pullies and Marbles, Oh My!
adventures.desc: Make a Rube Goldberg Device

adventures.title: When In Doubt
adventures.desc: Go to the library or a friend's bookshelf and pick a book to read without looking. After reading some, leave a note in it for the next person

adventures.title: Mono No Aware
adventures.desc: Make a piece of ephemeral art out in nature (leaf art, sand art, pebble art below the tide line on the beach, please no cairns!)

adventures.title: Burn Baby Burn
adventures.desc: Make a fire and toast marshmallows or make s'mores

adventures.title: Ukelele Optional
adventures.desc: Write a song and sing or play it for someone

adventures.title: It's Not A Trick
adventures.desc: Create an optical illusion

adventures.title: Look Up
adventures.desc: Decorate a ceiling

adventures.title: Cloudbusting
adventures.desc: Pick a day with some interesting weather and follow it closely, really watch how the clouds change

adventures.title: Future Orchards
adventures.desc: Plant something (a tree, a garden, a sunflower, some indoor herbs or sprouts)

adventures.title: Look Ma, No Hands
adventures.desc: Make a painting without using your hands

adventures.title: Behold! The Masked Wonder!
adventures.desc: Create a superhero identity for yourself and use it to do something

adventures.title: No Cheating!
adventures.desc: Play Calvinball

adventures.title: Epicsercise
adventures.desc: Play Chariots of Fire while you run barefoot on the beach, How Far I'll Go while you paddle your canoe with your hair streaming behind you, do Flashdance with your legwarmers on, ...

adventures.title: Billions and Billions...
adventures.desc: Go stargazing and try to see something new (the ISS, a meteor shower, Andromeda, the Milky Way, a constellation you haven't seen before...)

adventures.title: Picnic as the World Turns
adventures.desc: Have a sunrise or sunset picnic

adventures.title: No, You're Spinning
adventures.desc: Lie on your back and watch the sky. Try and think of yourself moving and the sky staying still. Feel you, and the earth, spin through space together
